text: Bad News Bears is a 2005 American sports comedy movie directed by Richard Linklater and starring Billy Bob Thornton Greg Kinnear and Marcia Gay Harden. It was a reboot to the 1976 movie Bad News Bears. ==Other websites== * Category:2005 comedy movies Category:2000s sports comedy movies Category:Bad News Bears movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Richard Linklater
title: Bad News Bears (2005 movie)
